message.content:
cs.IT, cs.ITP, cs.SI, cs.DS, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with maximization problems related to entropy, which are commonly studied in information theory (cs.IT) and statistical inference (cs.ITP). The linear constraint problem is also related to signal processing (cs.SI). The Burg-like maximization problem involves autocovariance functions, which are commonly studied in time series analysis and signal processing (cs.DS). Finally, the paper discusses the relationship between R\'enyi entropy rate and Shannon entropy rate, which is a topic of interest in machine learning and information theory (cs.LG).
